attributes.title: this app almost got me killed
attributes.review: i downloaded the app and immediately put in my phone number looking forward to worship my heavenly father Donald cheeto trump when i kept getting spam texts saying â€œi will find youâ€ or some along the lines of â€œyour life doesnâ€™t matter i will have you killedâ€ i as a boomer myself didnâ€™t have a clue on who it was doing this completely disrespectful thing to me i then preceded to text the number to stop and even tried blocking but to no avail i decided to get off of my phone for a few hours and go to my local Walmart only i had suddenly forgot the address so i googled it and it lead me to coordinates only the location itself wasnâ€™t the local wally world instead it was a run down strip club! i got out of my car in anticipation of finding walmart around but in stead 3 men in black suits walked out of the strip club and started cat calling me! it was quite flattering but they then went up to me and asked me out i have you know i am in a faithful relationship with my 8 cats so i politely declined the offer when they are went into a rage and began popping all of my fingers my screeches were not heard by the locals so i tried to make a run for it when the tallest of the 3 round house kicked me into the curb and the other two proceeded to curb stomp me! before they turned away and left me be i heard one of them mutter a bone chilling text i had just revived hours earlier from donald cheeto trump himselfğŸ˜ i canâ€™t believe he would betray me like this. this app doesnâ€™t even deserve one star.
